short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control the rotation of webpages in your tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rotate webpages in your tabs to the degree you want.

Rotate the content clockwise or anti-clockwise.

Convenient keyboard shortcuts.

Can input custom degrees for rotation.
Or use predefined rotations of 90 degrees.

Note that the extension won't rotate the Chrome Web Store pages.
